amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete section 129 which provides an exception for religious organizations to certain nondiscrimination in employment language contained in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered three printed in House Report 109-11 to strike the provision that protects the hiring rights of faith based organizations when they participate in WIA programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 239 (Roll no. 46).
